SEARCH
Package ru.nsu.lavitskaya.gradebook

Class GradeBook

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.lavitskaya.gradebook.GradeBook
public class GradeBook extends Object
Represents a GradeBook that manages grades for a student. This class allows for adding grades, checking scholarship eligibility, determining eligibility for a Red Diploma, and checking the possibility of transferring to a budgetary form of education.

  • Constructor Details

    • GradeBook

      public GradeBook(String name, boolean isPaid)
      Constructs a GradeBook for a student.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the student
      isPaid - indicates if the student's education is paid or not

  • Method Details

    • addGrade

      public void addGrade(Grade grade)
      Adds a grade to the current or next semester. If the grade's semester is greater than the current semester, it also updates the current semester.
      Parameters:
      grade - the grade to be added

    • setQualificationWorkGrade

      public void setQualificationWorkGrade(GradeEnum grade)
      Sets the qualification work grade.
      Parameters:
      grade - the qualification work grade to set

    • getCurrSemester

      public int getCurrSemester()
      Gets the current semester number.
      Returns:
      the current semester number

    • calculateAverageScore

      public double calculateAverageScore()
      Calculates the average score of all grades.
      Returns:
      the average score as a double; returns 0.0 if no grades are present

    • canTransferToBudget

      public boolean canTransferToBudget()
      Determines if the student can transfer to a budgetary form of education. The student can transfer if there are no "Satisfactory" grades in the last two exam sessions or if they paid but have no grades.
      Returns:
      true if the student can transfer to budget; false otherwise

    • eligibleForRedDiploma

      public boolean eligibleForRedDiploma()
      Determines if the student is eligible for a Red Diploma. The student is eligible if: - The qualification work grade is either null or EXCELLENT. - At least 75% of the grades from each course are EXCELLENT, and there are no "Satisfactory" grades.
      Returns:
      true if eligible for Red Diploma; false otherwise

    • eligibleForScholarship

      public boolean eligibleForScholarship()
      Determines if the student is eligible for a scholarship. The student is eligible only if all grades in the current semester are EXCELLENT.
      Returns:
      true if eligible for scholarship; false otherwise
